title: Similar to Report School font
content:
Hi,

I need help to identify this font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065150im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_6597.png)

It's very similar to Report School font.  
The letter S is specific, I believe.

Font: 

 Wigrum 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065150/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: Leon Pendleton

comments.content: Very close to [Aperçu](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065150/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/apercu/about-font) by Colophon but can't be positive that's it. What's the sample origin?

Thanks Ryuk,  
Yes, it's incredible close, but just - close.  
I took the sample from this site [thedesignfilesopenhouse.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065150/http:/www.thedesignfilesopenhouse.com/).

Thanks for the link. Was easier with it using Chengyin Liu's [Whatfont Google Chrome extension](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065150/http:/chengyinliu.com/whatfont.html) as it's embedded as WebFont. That's [Wigrum](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065150/http:/www.batfoundry.com/catalogue_9_wigrum_.html) by Bureau des Affaires Typographiques (BAT). It looks like to mix influences from Futura, aforementioned Aperçu and [Neutraface 2 HI](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065150/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface2). First time seeing it in action. Thanks!

Oh, now I see... they have some text set in Wigrum.  
My first thought, after I read your post, was: How he can see with Whatfont what font it is, if it's an image, not font? He must have some new voodoo version of Whatfont!

Thanks again!
